sentences.en: a healthy outdoor life
sentences.cn: 有益健康的户外生活

sentences.en: a huge outdoor market
sentences.cn: 一个规模庞大的露天市场

sentences.en: Breathable, waterproof clothing is essential for most outdoor sports.
sentences.cn: 大多数户外运动衣服必须透气且防水。

sentences.en: Give your brows extra definition with Outdoor Girl'sEyebrow Pencil in Brown.
sentences.cn: 用“户外女孩”品牌的棕色眉笔更加清晰地勾勒出眉形。

sentences.en: He likes watching most outdoor games.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢观看大部分的室外运动项目.

sentences.en: He will attend an outdoor concert in his honour in the centre of Paris.
sentences.cn: 他将出席在巴黎市中心特地为他举办的一场露天音乐会。

sentences.en: However cold it was, he never stopped taking outdoor exercise.
sentences.cn: 不管天气多么冷, 他都坚持户外锻炼.

sentences.en: I was rather an outdoor type.
sentences.cn: 我是那种特别喜欢户外运动的人。

sentences.en: If you enjoy outdoor activities, this is the trip for you.
sentences.cn: 如果你喜欢户外运动，这一旅行很适合你。

sentences.en: It is a fine weather for outdoor sports.
sentences.cn: 天气很好,有利于户外运动.

sentences.en: Mary was a better rider than either of them and she excelled at outdoor sports.
sentences.cn: 玛丽的骑术比他们俩都要好，而且她擅长户外运动。

sentences.en: outdoor clothing
sentences.cn: 户外装

sentences.en: outdoor recreational activities
sentences.cn: 户外娱乐活动

sentences.en: Tableware for outdoor use should ideally be unbreakable.
sentences.cn: 室外用的餐具最好是打不破的。

sentences.en: The body of the camera makes it highly resilient to outdoor use.
sentences.cn: 这部照相机的机身很适合户外使用.

sentences.en: The city is famed for its outdoor restaurants.
sentences.cn: 这座城市以其露天餐馆而闻名。

sentences.en: There is an inviting restaurant with an outdoor terrace.
sentences.cn: 有一家诱人的带露天阳台的饭馆。

sentences.en: Though with the widespread of the Internet, we can almost do everything at home, we have to enjoy our outdoor lives.
sentences.cn: 虽然随着互联网的普及，我们在家几乎可以做所有的事情，但是我们得要欣赏我们的户外生活。

sentences.en: Umbrellas shade outdoor cafes along winding cobblestone streets.
sentences.cn: 在曲折蜿蜒的鹅卵石街道的两边，一把把阳伞为露天咖啡馆遮阴挡阳。

sentences.en: We will take a chance to have the party outdoor.
sentences.cn: 我们将冒险举行露天聚会.

words.tran_cn: 户外的，爱好野外活动的；适用于户外的

phrases.tran_cn: 室外空气，户外空气；外伸架临时顶撑

trans.tran_en: existing, happening, or used outside, not inside a building
